metadata.title: Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC) Publications Database

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: Publications database provides bibliography.  Encompasses publications from all AFSC divisions: ABL; NMML; OCD; RACE; and REFM, from 1971 to present.  Contains over 4,000 citations for publications authored by Center scientists. Both Simple and Advanced Searches query all citation entries in the database for search terms (e.g, author's last name, common and scientific names, or key words in title). Search results provide complete citation details and links to available on-line publications.  Document type include: abstract, AFSC Processed Report, book, book chapter, book review, circulars, journal article, letter to editor, NOAA Technical Memorandum, proceedings, quarterly feature article, and other.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To make AFSC center publications accessible through the Internet.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None.

Use constraints: Contact Source.
